00064  static void Throw(int iCause = CZipException::genericError, LPCTSTR lpszZipName = NULL)
00065  {
00066   #ifdef _ZIP_IMPL_MFC
00067    throw new CZipException(iCause, lpszZipName);
00068   #else
00069    CZipException e(iCause, lpszZipName);
00070    throw e;
00071   #endif
00072  }
